titleStmt.title: Hecatonstichon, or, An elegy upon the much deplored death and solemn funeral of the Right Honourable Charles Earl of Mountrath, president of Connaght, &c., one of the lords justices of Ireland who deceased the 18 of December, anno Dom. 1661.
titleStmt.author: Haukes, Edward.

notesStmt.note: Signed at bottom: by Edward Haukes, His Honours domestique chaplain.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
